meanings.definition: The position of being a candidate.
meanings.sent1: Her candidacy for class president was well-received by her classmates.
meanings.sent2: His candidacy for mayor was announced in the local newspaper.
meanings.sent3: The candidacy of the class clown for student council brought laughter to the school.
meanings.sent4: In the race for team captain, his candidacy shone brightly among the other contenders.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's support for her candidacy inspired her to work even harder.

meanings.definition: The state of being eligible to run for a particular office or position.
meanings.sent1: His strong qualifications ensured his candidacy for the scholarship.
meanings.sent2: After meeting all the requirements, her candidacy for the job was confirmed.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's cute looks gave him a strong candidacy for the title of 'Best Pet'.
meanings.sent4: With her experience and skills, her candidacy for the promotion was undeniable.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's dedication and hard work solidified his candidacy for team captain.
